meanings.definition: The state of being interconnected or mutually dependent.
meanings.sent1: The interrelatedness of the ecosystem ensures the survival of all its inhabitants.
meanings.sent2: The interrelatedness of the characters in the story became evident as the plot unfolded.
meanings.sent3: The interrelatedness of the ingredients in the recipe made for a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The interrelatedness of the gears in the clock symbolized the harmony of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The interrelatedness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging yet satisfying to complete.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being related in a way that affects or depends on each other.
meanings.sent1: The interrelatedness of the team members was crucial for the project's success.
meanings.sent2: The interrelatedness of economic factors can have a significant impact on global markets.
meanings.sent3: The interrelatedness of the colors in the painting created a harmonious visual effect.
meanings.sent4: The interrelatedness of emotions and memories can influence our decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The interrelatedness of the plot twists kept the audience engaged till the end.
